SELECT items_comments.sepc_name AS specName, items_comments.content AS content, items_comments.created_time AS createdTime, users.nickname AS nickname, users.face AS userFace FROM items_comments LEFT JOIN users ON items_comments.user_id = users.id WHERE items_comments.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND items_comments.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT it.id AS itemId, it.item_name AS itemName, it.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, ip.price FROM items AS it LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON ii.item_id = it.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN( price_discount ) AS price FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) ip ON ip.item_id = it.id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND it.item_name LIKE '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
it.sell_counts DESC
ip.price ASC
it.item_name DESC
